articles.author: Khayl Adam
articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Demands Nearly 150GB of PS5 Storage Space - Push Square
articles.description: And we'll gladly give it up
articles.content: It's February now, and we are officially in sight of Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, the jaw-dropping sequel to Square Enix's 2020 Remake, out on the auspicious date of 29th February. The wait has been a … [+1201 chars]
